org.apache.jena.rdfconnection

Interface SparqlUpdateConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Transactional
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RDFConnection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RDFConnectionLocal, RDFConnectionModular, RDFConnectionRemote

    public interface SparqlUpdateConnection
extends Transactional, AutoCloseable
    SPARQL Update Operations on a connection.
    See Also:
    RDFConnection, RDFConnectionFactory
